file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: tracovid
  contact: {}
  version: '1.0'
servers:
- url: http://localhost
  variables: {}
paths:
  /login/facebook:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: login
      operationId: login
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/case/all:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: all-cases
      operationId: all-cases
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/case:
    post:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: add-case
      operationId: add-case
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/add-case-request'
            example:
              status: 1
              postalCode: 4200-192
              confinementState: 1
              condition: 1
              info: 
              geo:
                lat: 0
                lon: 0
              symptoms:
              - 3
              - 4
              - 5
        required: true
        x-send-file-in-body: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/add-case'
              example:
                status: success
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/symptom/all:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: all-symptoms
      operationId: all-symptoms
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/all-symptom'
              example:
              - id: 1
                symptom: Sem sintomas
              - id: 2
                symptom: Tosse seca
              - id: 3
                symptom: Tosse com expectoração
              - id: 4
                symptom: Febre (acima de 37.5º)
              - id: 5
                symptom: Dores musculares
              - id: 6
                symptom: Arrepios/calafrios
              - id: 7
                symptom: Dores de cabeça
              - id: 8
                symptom: Dificuldade em respirar
              - id: 9
                symptom: Náuseas, vómitos ou diarreia
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/condition/all:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: all-conditions
      operationId: all-conditions
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/all-condition'
              example:
              - id: 1
                status: Infeção confirmada
              - id: 2
                status: Caso suspeito
              - id: 3
                status: Recuperado
              - id: 4
                status: Presumo que não
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/confinementState/all:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: all-confinement-states
      operationId: all-confinement-states
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/all-confinement-state'
              example:
              - id: 1
                state: Afastamento social
                description: Presumo estar saudável e estou por opção em casa em prevenção
              - id: 2
                state: Isolamento obrigatório
                description: Estou doente e isolado através do afastamento social não contagiando outros cidadãos
              - id: 3
                state: Quarentena
                description: Sou um caso suspeito e estou isolado através do afastamento social não contagiando outros cidadãos
              - id: 4
                state: Vida normal
                description: Faço a minha rotina habitual
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/case/condition/4200-192:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: case-condiitons-by-postalcode
      operationId: case-condiitons-by-postalcode
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/case-condiitons-by-postalcode'
              example:
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                status: 1
                status_text: Infetados
                hits: 22
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                status: 3
                status_text: Recuperados
                hits: 2
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                status: 4
                status_text: Não sabem
                hits: 1
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                status: 100
                status_text: Com sintomas
                hits: 1
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/case/confinement/4200-192:
    get:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: case-confinements-by-postalcode
      operationId: case-confinements-by-postalcode
      parameters: []
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/case-confinements-by-postalcode'
              example:
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                confinement_state: 1
                confinement_state_text: Em casa, preventivamente
                hits: 3
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                confinement_state: 2
                confinement_state_text: Isolados
                hits: 2
              - postalcode: 4200-192
                confinement_state: 3
                confinement_state_text: Isolados
                hits: 2
      deprecated: false
  /api/v1/user:
    put:
      tags:
      - Misc
      summary: update-user
      operationId: update-user
      parameters: []
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/update-user-request'
            example:
              postalCode: 4200-192
              geo:
                lat: 10.34
                lon: 2.7999999999999998
              phone: +351960123122
              email: jane@doe.com
              name: John Doe
              patientToken: QWERTY
              showOnboarding: false
        required: true
        x-send-file-in-body: false
      responses:
        200:
          description: ''
          headers: {}
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/update-user'
              example:
                status: ok
      deprecated: false
components:
  schemas:
    add-case-request:
      title: add-case-request
      required:
      - status
      - postalCode
      - confinementState
      - condition
      - info
      - geo
      - symptoms
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        postalCode:
          type: string
        confinementState:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        condition:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        info:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        geo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Geo'
        symptoms:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      example:
        status: 1
        postalCode: 4200-192
        confinementState: 1
        condition: 1
        info: 
        geo:
          lat: 0
          lon: 0
        symptoms:
        - 3
        - 4
        - 5
    Geo:
      title: Geo
      required:
      - lat
      - lon
      type: object
      properties:
        lat:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        lon:
          type: integer
          format: int32
      example:
        lat: 0
        lon: 0
    add-case:
      title: add-case
      required:
      - status
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
      example:
        status: success
    all-symptom:
      title: all-symptom
      required:
      - id
      - symptom
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        symptom:
          type: string
      example:
        id: 1
        symptom: Sem sintomas
    all-condition:
      title: all-condition
      required:
      - id
      - status
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        status:
          type: string
      example:
        id: 1
        status: Infeção confirmada
    all-confinement-state:
      title: all-confinement-state
      required:
      - id
      - state
      - description
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        state:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
      example:
        id: 1
        state: Afastamento social
        description: Presumo estar saudável e estou por opção em casa em prevenção
    case-condiitons-by-postalcode:
      title: case-condiitons-by-postalcode
      required:
      - postalcode
      - status
      - status_text
      - hits
      type: object
      properties:
        postalcode:
          type: string
        status:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        status_text:
          type: string
        hits:
          type: string
      example:
        postalcode: 4200-192
        status: 1
        status_text: Infetados
        hits: 22
    case-confinements-by-postalcode:
      title: case-confinements-by-postalcode
      required:
      - postalcode
      - confinement_state
      - confinement_state_text
      - hits
      type: object
      properties:
        postalcode:
          type: string
        confinement_state:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        confinement_state_text:
          type: string
        hits:
          type: string
      example:
        postalcode: 4200-192
        confinement_state: 1
        confinement_state_text: Em casa, preventivamente
        hits: 3
    update-user-request:
      title: update-user-request
      required:
      - postalCode
      - geo
      - phone
      - email
      - name
      - patientToken
      - showOnboarding
      type: object
      properties:
        postalCode:
          type: string
        geo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Geo1'
        phone:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        patientToken:
          type: string
        showOnboarding:
          type: boolean
      example:
        postalCode: 4200-192
        geo:
          lat: 10.34
          lon: 2.7999999999999998
        phone: +351960123122
        email: jane@doe.com
        name: John Doe
        patientToken: QWERTY
        showOnboarding: false
    Geo1:
      title: Geo1
      required:
      - lat
      - lon
      type: object
      properties:
        lat:
          type: number
        lon:
          type: number
      example:
        lat: 10.34
        lon: 2.7999999999999998
    update-user:
      title: update-user
      required:
      - status
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
      example:
        status: ok
  securitySchemes:
    httpBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
security:
- httpBearer: []
tags:
- name: Misc
  description: ''
